contents.name: Instruction
contents.label: Instruction
contents.instruction: RTX (Real-Time Text) is a chat platform that allows users to communicate in real-time with each other. It is designed to provide a fast and efficient way to communicate with others, and it is often used for business purposes, such as customer support or team collaboration. RTX offers a variety of features, including chat rooms, private messaging, and file sharing, and it is available on a variety of devices, including desktop computers, laptops, and smartphones.

contents.actionMessage: The timesheet required option can only be enabled in one place.

elements.name: Section Heading
elements.label: OHS Induction Checklist

elements.name: Yes/No/NA
elements.label: Have you checked the competencies and qualifications of inductees?

elements.name: Yes/No/NA
elements.label: Have inductees signed on and added proof or permits and qualifications?

elements.name: Yes/No/NA
elements.label: Have you discussed and clearly stated the procedures for reporting incidents, injuries and hazards?

elements.name: Yes/No/NA
elements.label: Have you discussed the workplace safety rules?

elements.name: Yes/No/NA
elements.label: Has the person been taken through relevant safe work method statements for the tasks to be performed?

elements.name: Yes/No/NA
elements.label: Is specialised equipment required and have they been trained to use the equipment?

elements.name: Yes/No/NA
elements.label: Do people have the correct PPE available e.g. hard hat, safety glasses, safety boots, long sleeve shirt, and high visibility vest?

elements.name: Yes/No/NA
elements.label: Have you shown the person what to do in an emergency and identified the location of the assembly point and evacuation route?

elements.name: Yes/No/NA
elements.label: Have you shown the person what to do in an emergency and identified the location of the closest medical facility?

elements.name: Yes/No/NA
elements.label: Have you shown the person what to do in an emergency and identified the location of the contact details of emergency services?

elements.name: Yes/No/NA
elements.label: Have you shown the person what to do in an emergency and identified the location of the provisions for emergency communications?

elements.name: Yes/No/NA
elements.label: Have you shown the person where all relevant firefighting equipment is located, for example fire extinguishers and hose reels?

elements.name: Yes/No/NA
elements.label: Have you shown the person the location of the first aid facilities and kits, and who the first aiders are and how to obtain treatment?

elements.name: Yes/No/NA
elements.label: Have you shown the person where all the facilities are located including crib shed, toilets, and drinking water?

elements.name: Yes/No/NA
elements.label: Have you explained the workplace security procedures?

elements.name: Yes/No/NA
elements.label: Have you introduced the person to the Health and Safety Representative?

elements.name: Yes/No/NA
elements.label: Do they have any further questions or need clarification on any points or topics?

elements.name: Yes/No/NA
elements.label: Do they have any further questions or need clarification on any points or topics?

elements.name: Instruction
elements.label: Inductee Acknowledgement
elements.description: I confirm that I have completed the OHS Induction process, provided relevant pertinent documents, been informed of the rules and regulations, and commit to strictly adhering to the health and safety protocols during my engagement.
